transcript:
Customer: Hello sir, namaskar.
Executive: Hello, namaste ma'am.
Customer: Ji, namaste. Main baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se.
Executive: Ji ma'am, main baat, toh aapka wait kar rahi thi.
Customer: Ma'am, wo actually mera lunch ho gaya tha, isiliye main phir chali gayi thi.
Customer: Abhi aayi main.
Executive: 1 baje main wait kar rahi thi aapka.
Customer: Abhi main thoda sa, isliye main nikal gayi.
Executive: So sorry ma'am, actually main lunch karne chali gayi thi.
Customer: Aapko manage karna sikhana hai na?
Executive: Ma'am, wo actually mera ek aur meeting bhi tha, wo thoda lamba chal raha tha and then mera lunch ho gaya.
Customer: Okay. Abhi toh main ek meeting mein nikal aayi, thodi si der mein. Accha.
Executive: Toh phir, main kis number pe aapko call back karun, ye bataye. Shaam ko hi baat hogi, 4 baje ke baad.
Customer: Haan, theek hai, 4 baje ke baad na, main aapko message drop kar deti hu, theek hai?
Executive: Okay. Toh main us samay free rahungi na, 4 baje ke aas paas.
Customer: Okay, theek hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive called late due to lunch and meeting.

- Customer wants to know when to call back.



Resolution:

- Executive will message the customer after 4 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will message the customer after 4 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call back, meeting, lunch
